title: Text Me Love
description: In times of social networks, profiles with hundreds of pictures, smartphones and apps which make you type instead of talking, can true love even exist?Text Me Love is a story, a love story, fully told through private text messages. Through their words, their timing... You will discover the two of them in their own secret universe.Go with them through the ups and downs, through the good times and the bad, live their story as if it was your own. You can read it on your Kindle, PC, tablet or even on your own smartphone (using kindle app). This will make it look almost as if it were your own messages and your own story.
author: Eli Shulga
